MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the FK10 and FK13 postcode areas of Clackmannan and Alloa. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 7pm to carry out repairs on faulty overhead equipment near Sheriffs Yard and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5.45pm on 12th October 2020.
